summary: I made this potion for a friend of mine (Growly), but I figured I might as well upload it. This potion was designed specifically for him, but it should help the average warrior in his/her travels. NO LONGER BEING UPDATED, CHECK STEAM WORKSHOP FOR LATEST VERSION!!!
descriptionHtml: Â I made this potion for a friend of mine (Growly), but I figured I might as well upload it. This potion was designed specifically for him, but it should help the average warrior in his/her travels. It buffs standard warrior stats. I can't remember all of them, but it definitely does sneak, stamina, health, one-handed, two-handed, heavy armor, light armor and archery. It should be sold by the general store in each major city. It is also now craftable using a cooking pot and some usual, some unusual items (I can't remember exactly what it needs). NO LONGER BEING UPDATED, CHECK STEAM WORKSHOP FOR LATEST VERSION!!!
author: Lemonload
